Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered. Play Your Way Â· Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. Â· Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world. Manage MLB History Â· Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024 Â· Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of Â· Manage all on-field decisions and strategies Â· Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse Official MLB & KBO Licenses Â· Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase Â· Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters Create Your Perfect Team Â· Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world Â· Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users Â· Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available Â· Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team New This Year Â· Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more Â· 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation Â· Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale Â· KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation Â· Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about Â· Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play. Â· Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go" Â· And more! A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar â€” your personal guide to the planetâ€™s most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 â€” World Wetlands Day March 3 â€” World Wildlife Day March 21 â€” International Day of Forests March 22 â€” World Water Day March 23 â€” World Meteorological Day April 7 â€” World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 â€” Earth Day May 22 â€” International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 â€” World Environment Day June 8 â€” World Oceans Day June 17 â€” World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 â€” World Nature Conservation Day September 16 â€” International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 â€” World Animal Day October 13 â€” International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 â€” International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 â€” International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience. Some of the key features that VidHub offers include: - Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud - Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkvã€.aviã€.mp4ã€.movã€.rmvbã€.wmv, and more - High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions - The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB - Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services. - Support downloading and deleting cloud files - Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method. - Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server. - Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more. All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire. Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community. SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Donâ€™t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009. Here's whatâ€™s new in version 7: + Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience. + Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions. + Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device. + Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari. Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer. These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices. SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people. OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time. This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object. SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts. + Sky Tonight - jump to the new Tonight section to see whatâ€™s visible in your sky tonight. Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects. + Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations. New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data. + Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips. The Small Touches: + You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings. + Better Moon Age calculation. + New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines. + Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free - this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy. + Many more. If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it: + Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more! + Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events. + Control your telescope, log and plan your observations. + Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com. + Augmented Reality (AR) mode + Night Vision. + Orbit Mode. Leave the Earthâ€™s surface behind, and fly through our solar system. + Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way! https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html
